website_summaries.verdict: The pros outweigh the cons: the chimes look great and beautifully evoke a beloved classic. These are our top choice.
pros: Well-made, with a classic look and pleasant sound
The chimes are in tune for "Amazing Grace" and echo notes in the song
cons: Wooden disc on top is prone to cracking, cords holding chimes sometimes break, and it may sound tinny as the tubes are short

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, looks like it should hold up to the sun's UV rays for some time, has a lifetime warranty. Has nice chime to it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BEWAR OF CHEAP KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought Woodstock wind chimes before. They come in beautiful packaging with a rich sound and no dents, scrathes or cheap cuts in wood like this one. This is an aweful sound, light weight, cheap and has Woodstock signature on it. It arrived out of the box and has a made in China sticker on it. This is an obvious failure of a knock off. I'm losing faith in Amazon because this is starting to happen alot.
customer_reviews.author: Lowber

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality! Not like Original Woodstock.
customer_reviews.text: These were a huge disappointment. The quality has gone from wonderful to crap.
customer_reviews.author: CamelLot

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these in November and they were great. The usual quality I would expect from Woodstock Chimes. I just purchased 3 more and received what appears to be very cheap unmarked knockoffs of Woodstock Chimes. There are no markings on the product, only a sticker on the box and a cheap hangtag. Junk, Junk, Junk. They are going back. I would be shocked to find that these are real Woodstock products. If they are, Woodstock has really gone downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Blynnr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chime, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Wind chime, great customer service, The reason I gave it 4 stars is because the company tag is held on by the same string that holds the Pendent onto the wind chime. so be mindful of this and don't cut it off!! You need to un-loop it carefully, I think this is a bad idea to attach a tag with the same string that holds the chime together, but the customer service is excellent and sent another right out!
customer_reviews.author: JujuBeanz

customer_reviews.title: Great, Clear Tones on these Chimes
customer_reviews.text: These chimes were so nice that I bought another set for my mother's balcony. They're tuned beautifully and arrived in an incredibly well-packed box. I've shopped around for some nice chimes, and this is the best deal around. These chimes don't sound tinny or "tinkly" at all. You can hear the tones of "Amazing Grace" if you listen. It's really pretty! I still prefer the richer, deeper tones, but I know the only way to get those is to buy bigger chimes, and my pocketbook just can't afford that. For the price, this is a nice deal, and I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Citygirl

customer_reviews.title: The chimes have a good sound. I hung them over the graves of ...
customer_reviews.text: The chimes have a good sound. I hung them over the graves of my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: The seller's product was not authentic "WOODSTOCK CHIMES". All authentic Woodstock Chimes are engraved and come in original packaging, this did not yet it was listed and sold as Woodstock Chimes. There should be a category for ZERO stars! Worthless product, save your money; It fell apart within days of being put outside. Unfortunately, I threw it out instead of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Dis-grace!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I opened this before giving as a gift! It is fake, not true Woodstock Chimes Dollar store quality and sound made in China. Returned it soon as I opened it. Oh and to use the keepsake urn part? Get out the toolbox as you need a screwdriver to take it apart and put it back together again! Save time and money - read all the bad reviews from buyers who know these are a dis-graceful knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHonestReview

customer_reviews.title: sent a returned item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a christmas present and it arrived yesterday. When I opened the box, the tissue paper was all matted around the chimes. This is a returned item. I can't gift this to anyone. This is poor business practice. Other businesses on amazon give you the option of contacting them directly-not this one. The chimes seem unused and look like a Woodstock product-although the wooden parts look like they didn't get sanded before the stain was applied. I read other sketchy reviews and decided to take a chance...not my best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely NOT a Woodstock Windchime! I am very disappointed in this order! I'm only giving a 1 star because I had to!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Hon

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Hurricane-Only Chime
customer_reviews.text: The chime makes a beautiful sound....if you shake it yourself. However, the center wooden piece is too small. It blows around in the wind silently! Maybe in a hurricane it would actually make a sound hanging there. It is also cheaply made..... It looks and feels like something a high school student could make in shop class. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli Carol

customer_reviews.title: Loved it - engrave the wind catcher!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds wonderful. I can hear the tune of Amazing Grace (if played in the right order, which... how often is the wind gonna do that for you?). Nevertheless, it sounds beautifully and it saved my a$$ when me and my husband didn't get to take his mother out for mother's day. It was intended for myself, but just like that, it was her mother's day gift. :D She loves it! Take note that there are instructions on how to get the wind catcher engraved. I thought that was a great idea and if I had had the time, I would have had it done. Makes for an amazing personalized gift.
customer_reviews.author: JenTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Not Woodstock chimes
customer_reviews.text: These are not woodstock chimes. I saw a set of REAL woodstock chimes at a local gardening store and thought they were so pretty and sounded so nice. Looked up the same set on Amazon and they were cheaper. Bought them there, unfortunately these are just cheap knock offs. Really disappointed and will be returning, have contacted the seller but no word yet. They arrived in an unmarked box (that was slightly smashed) and they are no markings on them whatsoever, which if you have seen a set of woodstock chimes that is not what they look like. Bummer you can't trust amazon sellers anymore that call themselves WOODSTOCK CHIMES. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Drouin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, rich, full sound.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, the recipients loved it and hung it immediately (indoors as it was winter in New England). The chimes are well made and look built to last. I was gifted a medium set of Woodstock chimes and the sound is higher, almost "tinny" but still lovely. The large produces beautiful, full rich tones that are so soothing, especially with the Amazing Grace version I selected. Highly recommend and would purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *** DO NOT BUY - NOT A WOODSTOCK CHIME ***
customer_reviews.text: This chime is cheap, cheap, cheap junk. Picture shows a Woodstock chime, but get a carnivel prize. The tubes are thin 1/2" dia that are definitely NOT TUNED. There is no Woodstock engraving on the windcatcher; the wood is cheap pine. Ashley Cook's review and pictures are accurate. Don't waste you money.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T.

customer_reviews.title: How Sweet The Sound of These Chimes....
customer_reviews.text: I have several Woodstock chimes, and this was a great addition to my symphony. The tones of it compliment my other chimes, so I have lovely melodies. I wanted something to put directly in line with a nasty street light to counter the bad chi, and what could be more perfect than Amazing Grace?
customer_reviews.author: LBBPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: After having my chimes out for about 45 days the wood has cracked and one of the nails holding the cord/string was out causing two of the chime tubes to drop. I have purchased from this company before and not had a problem. I took the chimes down during any wind that was heavier than normal. Since my window for returning this is past I will try to repair this. Perhaps the chimes are being made cheaper than in the past. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lewin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chimes with a wonderful sound.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome wind chimes!! I have them on the porch, where they haven't caught much wind till these last few days. Woodstock is my favorite company for wind chimes. They would make a great gift for anyone who likes the beautiful sound of the chimes. I plan to buy bigger ones next year. Bought as 2017 Christmas gift for daughter. The Amazon wrapping is totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I loved theses chimes and have a few woodstock chimes that have lasted years. The amazing grace chimes I purchased fell apart after about 5 months. The string holding the chimes came undone in spots and the wood disk split down the middle. Theses are too expensive to only last a few months. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it when the wind blows
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Woodstock chimes and a couple other brands. Woodstock is the master chime maker. I'm tone deaf and can't carry a tune; thank goodness my Woodstock chimes can... even I can hear the notes playing Amazing Grace. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: BooCat Fan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Usually Woodstock chimes impress me.
customer_reviews.text: I own several Woodstock chimes. I have been happy with all. This is the exception and as luck would have it I'm giving it as a gift. It is really a strain to hear "Amazing Grace" in it at all. If the holiday wasn't so close I'd return. It's still a pretty chime so I'm gifting it although the label of Amazing grace all over it is going to be a let down once hung. Maybe they will exchange after if there is still time.
customer_reviews.author: J.P,

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awful!!
customer_reviews.text: This Wind Chime sounded tinny and awful. Not at all what I expected, the sound was so piercing it gave me an instant headache. I am returning it and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sunriseone

customer_reviews.title: Looking for quality? Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace Woodstock chimes I purchased 27 years ago (the wood finally split due to weather). Bought these October 29, 2017 and the string detached from the wood within 6 months and the wood dye ran down the chimes during a rainy period. I was able to temporarily repair at that time, but now the string has completely broken. The difference? QUALITY... or a lack thereof. Don't expect to get your money's worth out of this product. Not any more....
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Berrier-Nabors

customer_reviews.title: lovely beyond words❤
customer_reviews.text: I received these Amazing Grace chimes for my birthday. Wow! Stunning quality, resonance & tuning! We hung them on the patio in just the right location to catch a breeze. We are enjoying them in the extreme! Often, we hear the chime play the opening notes of the song; lovely! The volume & resonance is just right to hear randomly while indoors. While working outdoors, they are louder. We love them. Tremendous quality all around. My sister fell in love w/ them within seconds & order a set for herself.
customer_reviews.author: M Krenz

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago and it survived all those years in the Houston, TX climate. This one was packaged better and giftable. I didn't know that I could renew the one I had. It would have required a lot of re-stringing that I wouldn't want to do. The chimes themselves and the wooden parts were fine. I brad for string may have given out. No brads on this one. String goes straight through the holes. Would buy it again. Glad it was still available.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Not So Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents. I has heard one before, and could easily detect the "essence" of the hymn, Amazing Grace. Well, this one has been hanging on the edge of a covered open air porch for almost a year. I have only hear "Amazing Grace" tones chime out one time. I am over there taking care of them 24/7 several times a week. I always go out there to listen.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, loss of loved ones is part of life... Words are never enough to express our condolences but these beautiful chimes always comfort grieving friends and family members. If you add a gift wrap, your chimes will be packaged in a nice velvet green bag (at least in my experience, not sure if gift wrap options vary). Over the years, it has become my go-to gift for sad occasions and people always love these chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Pashnyak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews say these are beautiful and whimsical to listen to! Not harsh at all. I absolutely love hearing them outside our bedroom door where they hang in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good looks & sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother for Christmas. Very nice looking and sounding wind chime... recommended. UPDATE 2018-12-15: Liked it so much I bought several others... some for myself and some as gifts. See new photo of the Amazing Grace large chime... and the older photo of the Amazing Grace medium chime.
customer_reviews.author: Lantana Al

customer_reviews.title: Not Woodstock as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering a Woodstock Chime, but received a cheap pine and metal chime in plain box, sent from China. This is not at all Woodstock as advertised. It said it was an "Amazon Choice" product, so I thought I was safe ordering it. I am terribly disappointed that it was marketed as Woodstock brand and what I received was not labeled with Woodstock on it at all, it's not even a good imitation at all. The quality was so poor, I had planned on giving it as a gift for someone who lost their father. It looks like something you would buy at a dollar store, definitely not the quality of Woodstock. Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Walkinonsunshine

customer_reviews.title: FYI: The Woodstocks website has sound bits
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and very well made wind chime. I found them in a local shop and the sound is unbeatable. Granted they are a little more costly but worth it. If you can see it on the inside of this wind chime there is a small metal container. This is meant to put loved ones ashes in as a memorial. I know there are many of you out there who when ever they hear "amazing grace" they think of those who have went to a better place. Amazons prices are lower than going to the actual Woodstock website, but again, there you can hear the product before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes have a beautiful sound. Some other reviews say they are quiet, but we have not experienced that at all. As I type this, I have them hanging outside and can hear them from inside my house with all of the windows closed. Do not expect to hear Amazing Grace when the wind blows through them. You will get the notes, just not together. We have had the chimes hanging outside for about a year. They still look great, no obvious weathering or fading.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Cheep junk save your money
customer_reviews.text: Im very disappointed with this chime....super low quantity material and isn't worth the money at all....ive been trying to return this piece of junk back to the seller through Amazon 100% satisfaction guarentee , but neither Amazon or the seller would help me with the process and get me my refund....very disappointed in Amazon and there support center....and I'm still stuck with this piece of junk from CHINA and no refund........so very sad....
customer_reviews.author: silver god

customer_reviews.title: not like the others I've bought in the past that were ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 86 year old mom. They have the prettiest sound, not like the others I've bought in the past that were loud and clanky. She opens the door just so she can hear them. My daughter heard them and love them so I bought one for her. Love them. If the wind is barely blowing, you can make out a few notes of amazing grace.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene/Gina

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate hippie music box
customer_reviews.text: I think I had one of these when I was a hippie in Calif. How appropriate that I have one now as I relive my yute. I have it hanging in the open air under an eave on the sundeck. Doesn't make a lotta noise, its not obnoxious or jingly jangly, I have to tap it to wake it up, its very quiet, gentle, makes me wanna chant and meditate to my spiritual master Babaji. Or Devadip, or umm...whats his guru-ness. Aummmmm. I like it. I wish it played more songs.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the church bells I wanted but for the sound and the price it worked great. It was a Christmas gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this, I went to the Woodstock Chimes website and listened to how the chimes would sound. I wanted to make sure it wasn't the "tinkle tinkle" sound but more of a deeper sounding chime. Not quite the church bells I wanted but for the sound and the price it worked great. It was a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loved the sound and hung it outside right away - even though it was only 8 degrees out!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a windchime!
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected from something advertised as tuned by a Grammy winning artist. It was definitely tuned, but didn't sound spectacular or anything. I wish I had filmed the unboxing because it just kinda appeared as a Chinese made factory packed product. Overall, I'm fine with the purchase though because I bought it on sale and I've been wanting a windchime for the yard for a while now. Just wasn't as spectacular as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Morganational

customer_reviews.title: Chimes sound great.  Wood finishes wear off quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The chimes themselves are well-made and sound great. However, the finish on the wooden tail is already wearing off after just a few months outdoors. That is surprising and the only reason for three stars here. But, it is easy enough to sand down and refinish but I would have liked to have avoided that effort so soon after the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful melodious windchime
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful windchime, and it has a very pleasing musical sound to it. It's not "tinkly" and annoying like smaller chimes. It doesn't make noise constantly in the slightest breeze like them, either, but only when a breeze you can feel goes by. It does indeed play the opening notes from Amazing Grace, usually in random order, but every now and then it plays them in correct order, which is pretty neat. I think of windchimes as frivolous things and this was definitely an impulse buy, but it is one that I am very happy with. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: I love these windchimes
customer_reviews.text: I love these windchimes! I visited the manufacturer website to listen to each one before I decided on Amazing Grace. They sound lovely! A deeper tone than regular windchimes with a removeable and customizable wind catcher. Mine are hung at the back of my patio and even during the thunderstorms that rolled through tonight when I came home from work, it was only an occasional musical masterpiece (with the windcatcher attached). Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for! Didn't want to drive my neighbors nuts with them going off all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: S. Geinert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Musical chimes
customer_reviews.text: These make beautiful music when the wind blows. I have a set of bigger more expensive chimes but bought 2 of these chimes for my mother and a friend for Christmas. They are just as nice as my more pricey ones. The packaging was pretty and the presentation was perfect for a gift. Delivery was fast. I would definitely buy these Woodstock chimes again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: Love the melody of these chimes. The chimes are very well made. I have positioned these on my porch under cover of the roof in hopes of prolonging the life of the strings. All my other wind chimes have been out in the elements and the strings don't last. I am hoping having them under cover works. I have a lot of chimes to repair this winter getting ready for spring. I have a studio in my garage and when the weather permits I work out there from spring thru late fall and the sounds are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Music
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL windchime. My best friend reently passed away and I got her windchime from her garden- it rapidly began to fall apart. . . I found this one ( first choice to appear on search engine). It is the very same company that made her chime and has the very same tones as her original one. It is so special for me.
customer_reviews.author: lila..

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: This chime was ordered as a gift, so I have not been able to hear how it sounds yet. I can, however, say that it is a beautifully made chime comparable to any that I have seen. The wood is beautiful & the tubes are not the cheap, thin, tinny-sounding ones that many less expensive chimes are made with. It came in a nice box & was well packed to prevent damage to the chime. I would definitely order Woodstock chimes again & would recommend them to anyone who loves good quality chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel well made but barely make a noise. I"m no engineer but if was was manufacturing these I would make the banger in the middle 4 sided. I put two 90 degree folded post it notes on the blank sides for a test and it worked much better. I used wood glue and put two joiner biscuits cut in half to the blank sides and they now sound awesome. Simple engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tone and sound.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium set of these chimes in late November. They were so good that I bought the large set on December 3rd. I now have the two sets of chimes hanging with another set of Woodstock chimes. The sounds and tones are fantastic. It is a harmonic symphony that is a wonderful experience to hear. The large size is a bit loud, but does not drown out the smaller medium chimes. I am very pleased with this product and would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap with a tinny sound, and tangled up
customer_reviews.text: Haven't heard back from seller about refund, after 11 days! Although it's the same length of a chime I have from several years ago, the tubes and wood are much smaller, and lacks the deep tones. I find it curious that this same product is also listed for $44 here:  and Amazon says THIS is the product I purchased (and LOOKS more like what I was expecting.) I wouldn't even re-gift this, as it would reflect poorly on my taste in gifts. (Pen shown for size reference)
customer_reviews.author: sonni hopkins

customer_reviews.title: I have yet to hear Amazing Grace, but I know it's in there somewhere
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to hear Amazing Grace, but I know it's in there somewhere. It would be an amazing grace to have it hit the melody spot on. It's super resonant and loud. I had to actually move it bc on windy nights we couldn't sleep with the music going. I love it though.
customer_reviews.author: willo

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears!
customer_reviews.text: Woodstock chimes have wonderful tone! You can’t go wrong with these. They hang longer than anticipated. But its true to the measurement stated so that was my fault. Great gift. I’ve given Woodstock Chimes as Wedding gifts in the past and they have been loved by all lucky enough to receive them.
customer_reviews.author: kelleyn

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock small wind chime.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order before I hear it because there was many I liked in the stores before, but I did not like how they sounded. I was pleasantly surprised with this one, I love the sound and quality is excellent. Definitely will order more of this brand. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: This is a bad choice
customer_reviews.text: There are little flathead nails that hold the chimes string in place to the underside of the main wooden body... After about a month outside in varying weather conditions, the wood base started to swell which released the nails, leaving the chimes dangling and falling apart. I’m just so disappointed because originally the chimes made such a calming sound. $35 down the drain Sooooo disappointed
customer_reviews.author: tim boo

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS House Warming Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 or 5 of these small wind chimes over the last few years to gift to new neighbors or friends who are moving. The sound is beautiful and construction is solid. The small Woodstock box is very "wrappable". They are always an appreciated gift. I own three large Woodstock chimes myself: I love to hear them play. The sound is so subtle and welcoming. Also, the chimes have held up well to the Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are beautiful and the sound from them is wonderful. Not too loud, but enough to be heard a good distance away. Neighbor has a set with a higher tinkling sound, these are a deeper tone. Occasionally, when the wind blows just right, you can hear the beautiful beginning notes of amazing Grace.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this item was left out of my order the first time, but I am so glad that Amazon shipped out a replacement. These chimes sound so beautiful and clear. I am not sure I catch the tune Amazing Grace, but maybe, just maybe because I want to hear it, I catch some of the famous hymn. Regardless, they are quite beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Truitt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Woodstock wind chime that I've had, they obviously went through a cost reduction. The previous chimes had one string running through it and the string was tied at the ends. This chime has multiple strings tacked into place, it looks cheap. The quality went down. Instead of using a good wood that will last long in the weather, they use a light wood and stain it so it looks good at first, I doubt that it's going to last long. I'll shop around before I automatically buy a Woodstock wind chime again.
customer_reviews.author: G.L.Crow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chimes...
customer_reviews.text: These chimes have a really nice crisp tone. Just a gentle breeze will set them off. It also comes with a small brochure that explains and identifies each individual part. You can also order replacement parts or learn how to make repairs on your own. It is really relaxing sitting on my front porch at night and listen to these chimes.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful music to my ears.
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes are very nice quality and oh how they sound so beautuiful. Every time I hear there beautiful music it just gives me such a good feeling inside. They remind me of my Dad whom has been gone for some time now but I always feel his presence when I hear those chimes ringing out.I have other chimes but unfortunately they got old and the strings just shred and broke. I wish I knew how to restring them as they are still in beautiful condition minus the broken strings.
customer_reviews.author: debbie godschalk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for others or yourself!
customer_reviews.text: These windchimes are absolutely beautiful! They are perfect! Beautiful sound and design. I'm so clad that I bought these! One was for my Mama for Mother's Day, one for a sweet friend's bday, and one for myself. Amazing Grace is one of my favorite hymns. This is a great buy if you are wondering.♥️
customer_reviews.author: Janet S

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully resonant
customer_reviews.text: I love windchimes but am picky about the sound they make. These have a lovely sound quality that makes we wish for wind :). Some chimes of a similar type don't have as many tubes which makes this set more musical on windy days. Also the placement and size of the wooden disk in the middle ensures sound even in a light breeze. This set is less expensive than some of the same type, and also has better sound.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. King

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: We own four of these in the large size. The sounds coming from these chimes are just beautiful. We have had two for several years, and just received two more. If you are new to wind chimes, the Amazing Grace in the Large size is perfect. They are very well made, and are beautiful to the eye. We own other Woodstock chimes, and they are the best you can buy. You will not be disappointed. Makes a great gift for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Oldbdcopper36

customer_reviews.title: I love this windchime so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this windchime so much! Have been making a lot of changes to my backyard as I enjoy being out there a lot and knew I wanted a windchime. I wanted something that looked natural and sounded great. Wow this one hits both of those points! The sound is really beautiful and peaceful. I love hearing it chime from inside the house, it always makes me feel so calm and truly at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound!
customer_reviews.text: This chime is perfect. The notes are so crystal clear, and the design is simple. A six-rod hollow wind chime according to Feng Shui is especially well placed in the North for luck and success. The sound of the chimes actually have notes of the song Amazing Grace. You can tell the difference in comparison to cheaper chimes bought for decoration. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Happycustomer

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock Medium Amazing Grace Chime
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful chimes...finally a set that produces great sound...actually had to tape a few rods occasionally to mute them for meditation on our back deck...un-tape after. Very well made...exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Great company. Great product for a windy location.
customer_reviews.text: I like history of the company and the peaceful products. The wind chime just will not he sound demonstrated in the video. I wish it did make that sound especially because it was bought as a gift. The wind needed to make it chime is just more than a breeze we have in or geographical location. I am keeping it for our sun tent when we take beech trips. Contemplating adding a much larger piece at the bottom for enhancented movement.
customer_reviews.author: Random White Guy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVELY!
customer_reviews.text: I love wind chimes, and this is a real gem! Nicely packed, and includes background about the Woodstock Chimes company as well. Tones are beautiful and with great sustain. Unit is large and sturdy. It is well-crafted and sounds phenomenal. Love the look of it on my backyard patio. Always waiting for that gentle breeze... :)
customer_reviews.author: Seanzilla

customer_reviews.title: Fake Woodstock Chime
customer_reviews.text: I ordered what I thought was a Woodstock Chime on sale, and what I received was a cheap and poorly constructed chime. I have ordered other Woodstock Chimes from Amazon, and they have all been authentic. This one is not.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Winship

customer_reviews.title: Wind chimes are wind chimes.
customer_reviews.text: Wind chimes, in my opinion are NOT large. The longest flute is about 18 inches. These are slightly high pitched type chimes. They are nice. The only con would be that I wish the clanker was heavier. These will chime in the slightest breeze. UPDATE - I mounted a weight to the clanker which helped, but after almost 2 years, the main support string or line has broken due to weathering. So, is it worth the $50 for these? I would say no.
customer_reviews.author: Txmmoore

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I love wind chimes and this one is definitely one of them. It arrived on time and was very easy to hang. Not extremely loud but peaceful when a breeze or even a strong wind rolls through. Recommend it to anyone who is looking for a great gift for a nature lover or looking for some simple outdoor decor
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Z.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my fiancee in remembrance of her mother's passing. She was so impressed and happy with the the sound and the pitches. When it was placed outside the first time and the wind hit it she knew right away that it was Amazing Grace. It brought tears to her eyes. One of the greatest gifts I have ever given her. Thank you for making such an amazing product. Would definitely recommend this gift!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sound like "Amazing Grace" but still a great wind chime!
customer_reviews.text: Great wind chime - we have this in our back yard on our patio and its not too loud, although I haven't heard anything close to "amazing grace".. Good quality for the price. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Placed this on our back porch and can still hear the sounds through a closed door! UPDATE: I've changed my rating on this from a 5 star rating. After a year, the nails that hold the individual chimes to the wood block came out and the chime no longer chimes as intended. If you do purchase this, I'd recommend that you put some sort of weather proof glue over the nails to try and keep them from coming out. Since I can't return it, it ended up being cash in the trash. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ray Reasy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounding chimes that won't annoy neighbors
customer_reviews.text: I brought these chimes as a Christmas gift for my husband. They are melodious, but not loud. They add a nice touch to our backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love the sounds
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but my wife hates it. If you live in a windy area this thing will keep going and going and going...to the point where your wife says take this thing down and you realize you just spent time and money and now it’s a house relic.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Fake, low quality chime. I wish I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Fake, low quality chime. I wish I had read the review. It is not a Woodstock chime at all. Doesn't come in the Woodstock brand box. Just a cheap white box with a label that states Made In China.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lang Freiwald

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, brings joy
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of wind chimes. This is my favorite. The tone is really warm and clear, and it is tuned well to the advertised song. It’s always pleasant, but every now and then, it will play the notes of the song in order, and it’s such a fun little surprise, catching me off guard with a little moment of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Memory Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of these chimes because I give them to friends and family when someone close passes away. It is such a precious memorable gift to give. This last purchase I had a vinyl Bible verse put on it. The ones I have outside have been up for about four years. I have had no problems with them. So beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: Although I have yet to hear Amazing Grace I love the sound of these Chimes. They are solid and a nice mellow sound. I place them on my patio in an area where the wind would definitely hit them. Perhaps for some not enough but for me just the right amount of chiming. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: mommermom

customer_reviews.title: Medium is too big and not so pleasant if it's a windy area.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product but was making too much sound .. not appropriate with so many houses near by . Upon returning they deducted around 7 . So dropped the plan of getting smaller size. One star as it could have been mentioned in the description that return might not be possible without charging the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Veena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but loud
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely, melodious chimes in a light breeze, but on a windy day (or night) we have to pull them down for fear of annoying neighbors or losing sleep. They are much louder than anticipated!
customer_reviews.author: Zullo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this windchime. I have two other Woodstock chimes. A small version and a large version. In this I purchased medium. I do wish I would have invested in the large because I love the deeper tones. Overall I'm happy though. I gifted this to 3 other people for Christmas and I hope it brings them as my joy as its brought to our family ♡
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I love wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: This chime has a beautiful sound. It hangs outside my back door. This is my third chime as the wood warps over time in the elements. I considered getting one made of metal, but haven't found one that I like.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Used personalized vinyl to personalize and looked great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wind chime. I gave this as a gift to someone who recently lost a loved one. I added the name of the loved to the larger end pice using my vinyl cutting machine for a great personalized touch. It came out great and was appreciated by the recipient. It also came in a nice box with tissue to protect the wind chime suitable to wrap up for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: OKmama

customer_reviews.title: Wow...  such sweet sound...
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these highly tuned great sounding chimes. The sound is so soothing and I have been moving it when the wind is strong because I dont want to make the neighbors upset, and they both told me to leave it alone- they love it too. Nice deep rich sound. I'm buying another for my camp.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate NY

customer_reviews.title: A little shorter than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: You know, it is well built but I have to say I should have read the description better. I bough the large thinking "large" it is 40 inches but the actual longest tube is maybe half that distance so, it's fairly small in comparison of what I would consider a large wind chime. I play music and have for 40 years but I cannot "pick up" Amazing Grace in this set, sound like random tuning forks to me. Considering the price, I would probably look elsewhere for another wind chime set
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Awesome to See
customer_reviews.text: This Wind Chime is a beauty to see hanging on my back deck and has beautiful deep chimes. It may have to be moved further out in the yard for the summer months as it maybe too loud once we start spending time on the deck. At any rate I will still love hearing it and the craftsmanship is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law loves wind chimes; this is the brand we consistently purchase based on quality. You can search these chimes on YouTube to hear samples, just search the song name and Woodstock. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SBell

customer_reviews.title: great sympathy gift
customer_reviews.text: I have used this as a sympathy gift instead of sending flowers. You are able to write on the wooden part, "When the wind blows, Mary is with you". Or many different sayings that could be used.
customer_reviews.author: martha bixler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described... beaitiful!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift. I have the same one that I got when my aunt passed away. The soind is lovely! I love mine, and I know that the recipients of the gift are going to be beyond pleased as they lost a daughter in a car accident. Wonderful idea!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at and listen to
customer_reviews.text: We own this wind chime and bought this for a gift. The recipient loved it as much as we do ours. The sound is beautiful as is the chime itself. It doesn’t get tangled even on windy days. Very well made. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Gerety Hays

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these wind chimes as a gift but loved the look and sound so much that I bought them for myself, too! The notes are so lovely and peaceful and add so much to the enjoyment of my outdoor space on any breezy Spring and Summer day. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: penny1970

customer_reviews.title: I love the sound
customer_reviews.text: This wind chime literally sounds like music. It isn’t loud and annoying like some can be. I can hear it in my house when it’s windy and it’s amazing and let’s me know how windy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Love the tone!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes were exactly what I wanted. I enjoyed them from April until now. Unfortunately, the bottom wood piece came off in a storm and I can no longer enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Janss

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounds
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife for Christmas. She loved it. Hung it up that night and two days later a night storm moved through with 60 mph winds. What a beautiful sound. It was worth the price paid and more. FYI, it survived the wind just fine as did I.
customer_reviews.author: Sepen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing....
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and sounded just wonderful. Gave this one to my best friend for her birthday. My daughter introduced this Amazing Grace Chimes to me several years ago. I just love the music they make when the wind blows them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 3 of these as gifts for Mother's Day, money well spent in my opinion..
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, extremely nice looking wind chime, the tone is extremely nice and I find it soothing to listen to, therapeutic at least for myself and my wife, my Mother and my Mother in Law .. I purchased 3 of these as gifts for Mother's Day for the 3 most important Women in my life and they all loved them. I will purchase again in the future..
customer_reviews.author: Handgun Hunter.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for those who have everything!
customer_reviews.text: This is the neatest!! I bought for my husband's grandparents who have "everything" for Christmas. They were overjoyed to try it out and be able to hear sounds from one of their favorite hymns! It is a beautiful sound! I bought one recently for myself as well and am really enjoying the sweet sound (mine is a small version)
customer_reviews.author: AUDRA R

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Sound
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 sets of high quality wind chimes on our front porch including these and the sound is heavenly. We enjoy them a lot and the quality is very good. They sing with even the slightest breeze and a great addition to the peacefulness we work to create with our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazombie

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mom
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom. She opened them before taking them home and they sound beautiful. It's exactly what she wanted and I was surprised by how big these are for the price. I own 2 Woodstock wind chimes that I've bought for myself and this brand beats all others hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas Present for my Wife who has a larges collection of chimes.......She finally hung it outside in May and it literally fell apart today........2 1/2 months is not a great return on your money, woodstock is supposed to be the premier wind chime........
customer_reviews.author: Charles V. Zielinski

product_meta.title: Woodstock Chimes - The Original Guaranteed Musically Tuned Amazing Grace Chime, Medium, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:Medium| Color:Medium, SilverGUARANTEED MUSICALLY TUNED AMAZING GRACE WIND CHIME. This chime is precision tuned to the inspiring tones heard in the opening measures of Amazing Grace, one of America's best loved and most widely known hymns. PRODUCT FEATURES. Measuring 24-inches in overall length (total hanging length is measured from top of gather ring to bottom of wind catcher), this chime features an ash wood top with a beautiful cherry finish that is weather-resistant and 6 high-polish silver aluminum tubes that will not rust when exposed to the elements. EASY CUSTOMIZATION. The removable windcatcher can be taken to a trophy shop, printer or jeweler to be engraved or silk-screened. QUALITY THAT IS GUARANTEED. Woodstock stands behind every product they make with a one-year warranty and a lifetime tuning guarantee on their musically tuned chimes. WOODSTOCK THE ORIGINAL MUSICALLY TUNED CHIME. Tuned to beautiful melodies and scales from around the world and available in a wide range of styles, songs and sizes, you can choose the Woodstock Chime that speaks to your soul. HOW IT ALL BEGAN. Garry and his wife Diane founded Woodstock Percussion, in 1979 and it remains a family-owned business in New York's Hudson Valley. Grammy award-winning musician Garry Kvistad created the first Woodstock Chime from an aluminum lawn chair he found in a landfill. As a professional musician and instrument designer, he was fascinated by the Scales of Olympos, a 7th century pentatonic scale that can't be played on a modern piano. Garry had the idea to cut and tune the lawn chair chime tubes to the exact frequency of the ancient scale. The resulting Chimes of Olympos was the first Woodstock Chime and is still one of our bestselling wind chimes.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: Measures 24-inches in overall length - total hanging length is measured from top of gather ring to bottom of wind catcher

EXPERTLY CRAFTED: Features an ash wood top with a beautiful cherry finish that is weather-resistant; 6 high-polish silver aluminum tubes that will not rust when exposed to the elements; removable windcatcher for easy customization

EASY TO CUSTOMIZE: Woodstock Chimes does not offer engraving services, but the removable windcatcher can be taken to a personalization store, trophy shop, printer or jeweler to be engraved or silk-screened

QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: Created by Grammy award-winning musician and instrument designer Garry Kvistad, Woodstock Chimes offers a unique variety of high quality, affordable chimes, gongs, musical instruments and more that inspire, entertain and bring pleasure to people of all ages

MUSICALLY TUNED: High quality wind chime hand-tuned to the inspiring tones heard in the opening measures of Amazing Grace, one of America's best loved and most widely known hymns; lifetime tuning guarantee

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
